DOC.brief_summary: This clinical validation study carry validate efficacy test measure clinical application prostaglandin present endometrial fluid patient , 24 hour embryonic transfer . This test capable predict endometrial receptivity without need perform biopsy .
DOC.brief_title: Diagnostic Test Endometrial Receptivity 24 Hours Before Embryo Transfer
DOC.criteria: Any IVF patient treat single double embryo transfer BMI : 20 30 Normal ovarian response ( 7 8 ovocitos ) IVF treatment AFC ≥ 8 , ( AFC = Antral Follicle Count ) Elective embryo transfer Normal uterine cavity Age : ≤ 38 year old patient oocytes ; ≤ 50 year old patient donate oocyte . Patients recurrent miscarriage ( ≥ 2 biochemical miscarriage ; ≥ 2 clinical miscarriage ) Patients severe male factor ( ≥ 2*106 espermatozoides/ml ) .
